long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every Google search you perform it will automatically generate a separate tab group and any child tabs opened from your Google searches will be automatically added to the same tab group.

Key Features:

1. Automatic Tab Grouping: Each individual Google search you perform will automatically generate a separate tab group. No more manually organizing tabs.

2. Seamless Child Tab Integration: Any child tabs opened from your Google searches will be automatically added to the same tab group.

3. Efficient Group Closure: Tired of closing tabs one by one? "Magic Tab Group" offers a convenient shortcut – simply press Ctrl+q to close the entire tab group in an instant, saving you time and effort.

4. Expand and Collapse Tab Groups: "Magic Tab Group" allows you to effortlessly expand or collapse your tab groups, giving you the flexibility to focus on specific topics or keep a broad overview of your browsing sessions.

5. Streamlined Tab Management: With this extension, you can easily manage and navigate through your tab groups. Locate specific tabs within a group or switch between different groups with ease.

6. Custom Auto Grouping: Take control of your browsing experience by adding any other website for auto-grouping. All sites from the specified domain will be automatically added to the same group, ensuring a seamless browsing workflow.

"Magic Tab Group" – the Chrome extension that revolutionizes the way you manage your tabs. Streamline your workflow, increase productivity, and never lose track of important information again.

Get "Magic Auto Group" now and enjoy a clutter-free browsing experience like never before!
